contents.text: Welcome to Iris Automation in San Francisco, pioneers of safer drones with advanced collision avoidance.
For sales and product information, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our consumer sales team.

navigationGoals: I want pricing and availability for a consumer collision-avoidance drone.
Ask about pricing and veteran discounts on a consumer drone model
Obtain a detailed spec sheet and pricing for Iris consumer UAVs with advanced collision-avoidance features
I’d like simple information on a consumer drone model that’s easy for me to fly and its price
Inquire about pricing and specifications of a consumer drone suitable for physics demonstrations

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you to our enterprise solutions team.

navigationGoals: I want details on enterprise drone integration and volume discounts.
Inquire about enterprise drone packages suitable for a veteran-led search-and-rescue business
Discuss enterprise UAV fleet integration, API access, and bulk licensing costs
I need details on your enterprise drone packages and help understanding how they’d work for my community center
Discuss enterprise drone package options for a university research project in atmospheric studies

contents.text: For customer support and service, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I want help troubleshooting my drone’s collision-avoidance sensors.
Get help troubleshooting my drone’s collision avoidance system
Troubleshoot SDK connection errors in my UAV’s collision-avoidance module
I’m having trouble connecting my drone to the app and need step-by-step technical help
Get assistance troubleshooting sensor calibration issues on my recently acquired drone

contents.text: For warranty claims and repairs, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our warranty and repairs department.

navigationGoals: I want to file a warranty claim to repair my damaged drone.
Initiate a warranty repair request for a damaged drone under warranty
File a warranty claim and schedule repair for a faulty obstacle-detection sensor on my UAV
My drone stopped working under warranty and I want to file a repair claim and learn the repair timeline
File a warranty repair request for a drone damaged during lab testing
